    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sodis.de:MELT-04602180.9</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>DE.FWU</catalog>
            <entry>MELT-04602180.9</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Vom Plankton zu Erdöl und Erdgas</string>
            <string language="en">How plankton becomes oil and natural gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment le plancton devient pétrole et gaz 
naturel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como o plankton se transforma óleo e gás natural</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come il plancton si transforma in in petrolio ed in
gas naturale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς το πλαγκτόν γίνεται πετρέλαιο και φυσικό 
αέριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo el plancton se convierte en aceite y gas 
natural</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Arbeitsblatt zur Entstehung von Erdöl und Erdgas aus abgestorbenen Kleinlebewesen. Eine Auswahl an Begriffen steht zur Verfügung.</string>
            <string language="en">Worksheet on oil and natural gas formation from dead microorganisms. Selected terms are provided.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Erdöl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Erdgas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Oil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Natural gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau sur la formation de pétrole et de gaz 
naturel à partir des micro-organismes morts. Des limites 
choisies sont fournies.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha na formação do óleo e do gás natural dos 
microorganisms inoperantes. Os termos selecionados são 
fornecidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro su formazione del gas naturale e 
del petrolio a partire dai microorganismi guasti. I termini 
selezionati sono forniti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας στο πετρέλαιο και φυσικός αέριο 
σχηματισμός από τους νεκρούς μικροοργανισμούς. Οι 
επιλεγμένοι όροι παρέχονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hoja de trabajo en la formación del aceite y del 
gas natural de microorganismos muertos. Se proporcionan los 
términos seleccionados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Huile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gaz naturel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Óleo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gás natural</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Olio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gas naturale</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυσικός αέριο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aceite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gas natural</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
